TriggerType.description: Trigger Type like T_SUBSCRIBER_INFO, T_FAVORITES etc

items.description: List of Mac addresses of client STB.If trigger type is T_MESSAGE_INFO then MACAddress would be treated as target. If trigger type is other than T_MESSAGE_INFO then only the first MACAddress in list would be considered and would filter out to from target STBs.

TriggerInfo.description: Additional inforamtion requied for trigger like message id

Timestamp.description: Epoch Time of notification. this is required to send trigger to TQS server
